== Examples ==

This page lists example code snippets using the [scribd] library.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/python-scribd/source/browse/trunk/examples/upload.py upload.py]

    Uploading a text file to scribd.com and removing it afterwards.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/python-scribd/source/browse/trunk/examples/user.py user.py]

    Signing in as a scribd.com user and accessing users's documents.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/python-scribd/source/browse/trunk/examples/appengine.py appengine.py]

    Creating a web application listing all documents belonging to the API user and allowing to upload new ones.

    The script is meant to run on [http://code.google.com/appengine Google App Engine], a web applications development platform using Python (and Java) language, from Google.
